CardDemo.page_description: Demonstration of Card components with Horizontal (Grid-List) and Vertical (Grid Normal) layouts
CardDemo.section1_description: Cards displayed horizontally in a single row with scroll
CardDemo.section2_description: Cards displayed in responsive grid: 1 column on mobile, 2 on tablet, 3 on desktop
CardDemo.section5_description: New content will be available soon in this section
CardDemo.info_horizontal_desc: Cards aligned in a single row with horizontal scroll
CardDemo.card1_description: New features in Next.js 15 that make development faster and more efficient. Learn about React Server Components, streaming, and optimizations.
CardDemo.card2_description: Understanding server components and how to optimize React application performance with server-side rendering.
CardDemo.card3_description: Tips and tricks to maximize Tailwind CSS usage in your projects. From utility classes to custom configurations.
CardDemo.card4_description: Complete guide to writing clean and type-safe TypeScript code. Improve your code quality with a strong type system.
CardDemo.card5_description: Strategies to optimize website performance for better user experience. Core Web Vitals, lazy loading, and caching strategies.
CardDemo.card6_description: Modern CSS techniques like Grid, Flexbox, Container Queries, and CSS Variables for more flexible layouts.
CardDemo.card7_description: Important principles in designing scalable, maintainable, and developer-friendly RESTful APIs.
CardDemo.card8_description: Comparison of various state management solutions: Context API, Redux, Zustand, Jotai. Choose what fits your project needs.
